h1.style: margin-bottom: 1em; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center;

p.style: margin-bottom: 1em; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: arial, helvetica, clean, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.br: Woodland Community School District #5 advocates for students in a safe and nurturing learning environment, and encourages student curiosity, goal setting, and problem solving in order to create productive members of society.

p.style: margin-bottom: 1em; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: arial, helvetica, clean, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.br: Students will be supported academically, emotionally, and behaviorally in an environment where they gain an appreciation for student and staff diversity, family, and the Woodland community to be prepared for their next level of education.

p.style: margin-bottom: 1em; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: arial, helvetica, clean, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.strong: Junior High and High School Vision Statement:

span.br: Students are celebrated, encouraged, and supported as they are given opportunities to explore interests for college and careers. They will be provided with personal and professional resources to become productive members of society.

p.style: margin-bottom: 1em; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: arial, helvetica, clean, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;

span.br: Woodland Graduates know how to think critically, solve problems in life, adapt to their surroundings, and establish and accomplish lifelong goals.

div.style: margin: 1em 0px; padding: 0px; clear: both; float: left; width: 745px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: arial, helvetica, clean, sans-serif;

div.data-description:
WOODLAND COMMUNITY UNIT DISTRICT NO. 5 5800 E. 3000 North Rd, Streator, Illinois 61364-8881 815-672-5974 Ryan McGuckin, Superintendent Jacob Burcenski, Principal Jodi Peterson, Special Education Coordinator Kristin Mangrich, Assistant Principal
Vision and Mission Statements Mission Statement: Woodland Community School District #5 advocates for...
